ja447:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja447:0.4_0: The Longer Discourse on the goal.
ja447:1.4_0: Why shouldn’t I be young, but given to you?”
ja447:10.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.”
ja447:11.1_0: “Dhamma surely protects one who practices Dhamma;
ja447:11.2_0: The teaching brings happiness when practiced well.
ja447:11.3_0: This is the benefit of practicing Dhamma:
ja447:11.4_0: one doesn’t go to a bad destination.
ja447:12.1_0: For the teaching indeed protects one who practices Dhamma;
ja447:2.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:3.2_0: nor do I believe in the Dhamma.
ja447:3.3_0: having given up neither there nor wish,
ja447:3.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:4.1_0: I shall be in a gift thinking of giving;
ja447:4.2_0: Giving up continued existence, they’re uplifted.
ja447:4.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:5.1_0: We will see an ascetic and a brahmin,
ja447:5.3_0: satisfying her with food and drink,
ja447:5.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:6.2_0: wife, but the wife to not see.
ja447:6.3_0: Those who practice the spiritual life
ja447:6.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:7.1_0: Having refrained from killing living creatures,
ja447:7.2_0: Deception of stealing in the world,
ja447:7.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:8.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
ja447:9.4_0: That’s why I’m youngling to you.
